mapper.sql: t_house_equity_demand_supply.id, t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id AS userId, t_house_equity_demand_supply.equity_option AS equityOption, t_house_equity_demand_supply.area,t_end_user.phone AS phoneNumber, t_house_equity_demand_supply.create_time AS createTime, t_end_user.phone AS phoneNumber, t_end_user.avatar AS userAvatar, t_end_user.name AS userName, t_end_user.real_name AS realName
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_equity_demand_supply.*, t_end_user.phone AS phoneNumber, t_end_user.avatar AS userAvatar, t_end_user.name AS userName FROM t_house_equity_demand_supply JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id WHERE t_house_equity_demand_supply.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_equity_demand_supply.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_equity_demand_supply
JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.equity_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.equityOption},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.area},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.area >= #{leftRange}
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.area <= #{rightRange}
and (t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
ORDER BY t_house_equity_demand_supply.area Desc
ORDER BY t_house_equity_demand_supply.create_time DESC,t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id
